lead_paragraph: MAIMIN, David S.,on January 14, 2016. He attended Horace Mann School, Brown University and Columbia's Graduate School of Business, before serving as an army officer during the Korean War. He had a long and rewarding career with H. Maimin & Co., manufacturers of electric cutting machines. He leaves his beloved wife and best friend, Sybil, sons Daniel (Mark) and Michael (Rachel) and twin grandsons, William and Charles, born during the last year of his life. Funeral services at Plaza Funeral Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue, Sunday, January 17, 11am. Donations may be made in his memory to The City Congregation for Humanistic Judaism or Central Park Conservancy. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIMIN, DAVID S.
